sub_title: Enterprise Transformation Consultant, Scale up Coach & Leadership facilitator
summary:
Author of:
- ICAgile certified Agile Team Facilitation course for NTUC Learning Hub
- ICAgile certified Delivery at Scale for Arvivo
- ICAgile certified Agile Fundamentals for Arvivo

Current associations:
External Advisor at McKinsey
Enterprise Coach, Trainer & Consultany: Arvivo (Singapore)

Recent Engagements:
- Bank of Singapore
- Prudential
- NTUC Learning Hub
- Roche Pharmaceuticals
- Razer Gaming
- Civil Service College
- Civil Aviation Authority
- Sephora

After having worked as a Consultant for many years in The Netherlands when life took turn to bring me to Singapore, I decided to continue helping and inspiring my clients in Asia as a Principal Consultant at Arvivo.

I am a seasoned Agile Coach & Consultant with 14 years of experience within IT consulting, including business growth, portfolio management, strategy formulation and execution. I have extensive experience with multi-nationals and a proven track record of leading Agile transformation in complex technical and operational programs.

During my career, I have successfully assisted several clients at Philips, NN (sister concern of ING), Prudential etc in producing methodologies and implementing processes to improve their software development capabilities, from initial scoping and business case through to deployment & release. This included defining workflows, providing training and coaching teams to excel their performance and productivity.

I feel privileged to have worked with many sophisticated companies and by helping Leaders and Transformation leads in their Agile Transformation journey.
With a global mind and personality, I have the experience of living and working in The Netherlands, India, and Singapore.

Passion and hard work are the two traits that reflect me the most as an individual. I am a big believer in Agile ways of working. Reach out at nidhi@arvivo.global if you want to talk Agile, Business transformation, finance, or technology.
